verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--"ei bālaka āmāra mata jāne
santuṣṭa ha-ilāṅ āmi ihāra nimantraṇe"

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; ei bālaka—this boy; āmāra mata—My mind; jāne—can understand; santuṣṭa ha-ilāṅ—am very satisfied; āmi—I; ihāra nimantraṇe—by his invitation.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said, "This boy knows My mind. Therefore I am very satisfied to keep his invitation."
